animation.title: Animation
animation.description: An animation is a set of keyframes that can be applied to an element.

variables.title: Variable Definition
variables.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

control.title: Element
control.description: An element is a control that can be added to a screen. It can be a button, a label, an image, etc.

anyOf.title: Item reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an item: using the following syntax: [element_name]@[namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Item reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an item: using the following syntax: [namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Variable reference
anyOf.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

C.title: Animation Reset Name
C.description: The name of the animation that will be reset.

F.title: Variable
F.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

E.title: Destroy At End
E.description: If true, the element will be destroyed at the end of the animation.

G.title: Disable Anim Fast Forward
G.description: If true, the animation will not be fast forwarded.

BB.title: End Event
BB.description: The event that will be triggered when the animation ends.

BE.title: Frame Count
BE.description: The number of frames in the animation.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

BG.title: From
BG.description: The starting point of the animation.

BI.title: Initial UV
BI.description: The initial UV of the animation.

BJ.title: Next
BJ.description: The name of the next element.

CA.title: Play Event
CA.description: The event that will be played.

CB.title: Propagate Alpha
CB.description: If true, the alpha will be propagated.

CC.title: Reversible
CC.description: If true, the animation will be reversible.

CD.title: Scale From Starting Alpha
CD.description: If true, the animation will scale from the starting alpha.

CE.title: To
CE.description: The ending point of the animation.

CH.title: Allow Clipping
CH.description: If true, the element will allow clipping.

CI.title: Allow Scroll Even When Content Fits
CI.description: If true, the element will allow scrolling even when the content fits.

DA.title: Always Handle Pointer
DA.description: If true, the element will always handle the pointer.

DB.title: Always Handle Scrolling
DB.description: If true, the element will always handle scrolling.

DC.title: Always Listen To Input
DC.description: If true, the element will always listen to input.

DD.title: Always Rotate
DD.description: If true, the element will always rotate.

DF.title: Anchor
DF.description: An anchor is a reference to an element in the UI.

DE.title: Anchor From
DE.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

DG.title: Anchor To
DG.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

DH.title: Animations
DH.description: The animations that are contained within this element.

DI.title: Background Control
DI.description: The control that will be used for the background.

DJ.title: Background Hover Control
DJ.description: The control that will be used for the background when hovered.

EA.title: Backup Font Type
EA.description: The type of the backup font.

EB.title: Bilinear
EB.description: If true, the element will use bilinear filtering.

EC.title: Bindings
EC.description: The bindings that are contained within this element.

binding_collection_name.title: Binding Collection Name
binding_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_collection_prefix.title: Binding Collection Prefix
binding_collection_prefix.description: The prefix of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_condition.title: Binding Condition
binding_condition.description: The condition that must be met for the binding to be applied.

binding_name.title: Binding Name
binding_name.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

binding_name_override.title: Binding Name Override
binding_name_override.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

ignored.title: Ignored
ignored.description: If true, the binding will be ignored.

resolve_sibling_scope.title: Resolve Sibling Scope
resolve_sibling_scope.description: If true, the binding will resolve sibling scope.

source_control_name.title: Source Control Name
source_control_name.description: The name of the control that the binding is in.

source_property_name.title: Source Property Name
source_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

target_property_name.title: Target Property Name
target_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

ED.title: Button Mappings
ED.description: The button mappings that are contained within this element.

EE.title: Cache Screen
EE.description: If true, the screen will be cached.

EF.title: Checked Control
EF.description: The control that will be checked.

EG.title: Checked Hover Control
EG.description: The control that will be checked when hovered.

EH.title: Checked Locked Control
EH.description: The control that will be checked when locked.

EI.title: Checked Locked Hover Control
EI.description: The control that will be checked when locked and hovered.

EJ.title: Clip Direction
EJ.description: The direction that the element will be clipped in.

FA.title: Clip Pixel Perfect
FA.description: If true, the element will be clipped pixel perfect.

FB.title: Clips Children
FB.description: If true, the element will clip its children.

FC.title: Close On Player Hurt
FC.description: If true, the element will close when the player is hurt.

FD.title: Collection Index
FD.description: The index of the collection that the element is in.

FE.title: Collection Name
FE.description: The name of the collection that the element is in.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

FF.title: Color
FF.description: The color of the text. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

FH.title: Consume Hover Events
FH.description: If true, the element will consume hover events.

FI.title: Contained
FI.description: If true, the element will be contained.

GA.title: Controls
GA.description: The controls that are contained within this element.

GB.title: Default Control
GB.description: The default control that will be focused.

GC.title: Default Focus Precedence
GC.description: The default focus precedence of the element.

GD.title: Draggable
GD.description: If true, the element will be draggable.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

GE.title: Dropdown Area
GE.description: The area that the dropdown will be in.

GG.title: Dropdown Content Control
GG.description: The control that will be used for the dropdown content.

GI.title: Enable Directional Toggling
GI.description: If true, the element will enable directional toggling.

GJ.title: Enable Profanity Filter
GJ.description: If true, the element will enable the profanity filter.

HA.title: Enabled Newline
HA.description: If true, the element will be enabled when a new line is created.

HB.title: Enabled
HB.description: If true, the element will be enabled.

HC.title: Factory
HC.description: The factory that will be used to create the element.

control_name.title: Control Name
control_name.description: The name of the control that will be created by the factory.

factory_variables.title: Factory Variables
factory_variables.description: The variables that will be used by the factory.

HD.title: Fill
HD.description: If true, the element will fill the screen.

HI.title: Focus Container
HI.description: If true, the element will be a focus container.

HJ.title: Focus Enabled
HJ.description: If true, the element will be focus enabled.

IA.title: Focus Identifier
IA.description: The identifier of the element that will be focused.

IB.title: Focus Magnet Enabled
IB.description: If true, the element will be focus magnet enabled.

ID.title: Navigation Mode
ID.description: The navigation mode of the UI.

IC.title: Focus Navigation Mode Down
IC.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating down.

IE.title: Focus Navigation Mode Left
IE.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating left.

IF.title: Focus Navigation Mode Right
IF.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating right.

IG.title: Focus Navigation Mode Up
IG.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating up.

IH.title: Focus Wrap Enabled
IH.description: If true, the element will be focus wrap enabled.

II.title: Font Scale Factor
II.description: The scale factor of the font.

JB.title: Force Render Below
JB.description: If true, the element will be rendered below the screen.

JC.title: Force Texture Reload
JC.description: If true, the texture will be reloaded.

JD.title: Grid Dimension Binding
JD.description: The binding that will be used for the grid dimension.

JF.title: Grid Item Template
JF.description: The template that will be used for the grid item.

JH.title: Grid Rescaling Type
JH.description: The type of the grid rescaling.

JI.title: Handle Deselect
JI.description: If true, the element will handle deselect.

JJ.title: Handle Select
JJ.description: If true, the element will handle select.

BAA.title: Hide Hyphen
BAA.description: If true, the element will hide the hyphen.

BAB.title: Hover Alpha
BAB.description: The alpha of the text when hovered.

BAC.title: Hover Color
BAC.description: The color of the text when hovered. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

BAD.title: Hover Control
BAD.description: The control that will be hovered.

BAE.title: Hover Enabled
BAE.description: If true, the element will be hover enabled.

BAF.title: Ignored
BAF.description: If true, the element will be ignored.

BAG.title: Images
BAG.description: The images that are contained within this element.

BAH.title: Indent Control
BAH.description: The control that will be indented.

BAI.title: Inherit Max Sibling Height
BAI.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum height of its siblings.

BAJ.title: Inherit Max Sibling Width
BAJ.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum width of its siblings.

BBA.title: Is Modal
BBA.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BBB.title: Is Showing Menu
BBB.description: If true, the element will be showing the menu.

BBC.title: Jump To Bottom On Update
BBC.description: If true, the element will jump to the bottom when updated.

BBD.title: Keep Ratio
BBD.description: If true, the element will keep its ratio.

BBE.title: Layer
BBE.description: The layer that the element will be rendered in. Higher layers are rendered on top of lower layers.

BBF.title: Localize
BBF.description: If true, the element will be localized.

BBG.title: Locked Alpha
BBG.description: The alpha of the text when locked.

BBH.title: Locked Color
BBH.description: The color of the text when locked. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

BBI.title: Locked Control
BBI.description: The control that will be locked.

BBJ.title: Low Frequency Rendering
BBJ.description: If true, the element will be rendered at a lower frequency.

BCA.title: Max Length
BCA.description: The maximum length of the text. If the text is longer than this, it will be truncated.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

BCB.title: Max Size
BCB.description: The maximum size of the element.

BCD.title: Maximum Grid Items
BCD.description: The maximum number of grid items.

BCE.title: Min Size
BCE.description: The minimum size of the element.

BCF.title: Modal
BCF.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BCG.title: Offset
BCG.description: The offset of the element from the anchor point. horizontal by vertical.

BCI.title: Place Holder Control
BCI.description: The control that will be used for the place holder.

BCJ.title: Pressed Alpha
BCJ.description: The alpha of the text when pressed.

BDA.title: Pressed Color
BDA.description: The color of the text when pressed. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

BDB.title: Pressed Control
BDB.description: The control that will be pressed.

BDC.title: Prevent Touch Input
BDC.description: If true, the element will prevent touch input.

BDD.title: Primary Color
BDD.description: The primary color of the element. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

BDE.title: Progress Control
BDE.description: The control that will be used for the progress.

BDF.title: Progress Hover Control
BDF.description: The control that will be used for the progress when hovered.

BDG.title: Property Bag
BDG.description: The property bag that will be used by the element.

BDI.title: Radio Toggle Group
BDI.description: The radio toggle group that the element is in.

BDJ.title: Render Game Behind
BDJ.description: If true, the game will be rendered behind the element.

BEA.title: Render Only When Topmost
BEA.description: If true, the element will only be rendered when it is the topmost element.

BEB.title: Renderer
BEB.description: The renderer that will be used by the element.

BEC.title: Reset Event
BEC.description: The event that will be reset.

BED.title: Reset On Focus Lost
BED.description: If true, the element will be reset when focus is lost.

BEE.title: Rotate Speed
BEE.description: The speed that the element will rotate at.

BEF.title: Screen Draws Last
BEF.description: If true, the screen will be drawn last.

BEG.title: Screen Not Flushable
BEG.description: If true, the screen will not be flushed when the element is added.

BEH.title: Scroll Box And Track Panel
BEH.description: The panel that will be used for the scroll box and track.

BEI.title: Scroll Content
BEI.description: The content that will be scrolled.

BEJ.title: Scroll Speed
BEJ.description: The speed that the element will scroll at.

BFA.title: Scroll View Port
BFA.description: The view port that the element will be scrolled in.

BFC.title: Scrollbar Touch Button
BFC.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar touch.

BFD.title: Scrollbar Track Button
BFD.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar track.

BFF.title: Send Telemetry
BFF.description: If true, the element will send telemetry.

BFG.title: Shadow
BFG.description: If true, the text will have a shadow.

BFH.title: Should Steal Mouse
BFH.description: If true, the element will steal the mouse.

BFJ.title: Slider Box Control
BFJ.description: The control that will be used for the slider box.

BGA.title: Slider Collection Name
BGA.description: The name of the collection that the slider is in.

BGB.title: Slider Deselected Button
BGB.description: The button that will be used for the slider deselected.

BGE.title: Slider Select On Hover
BGE.description: If true, the slider will select on hover.

BGF.title: Slider Selected Button
BGF.description: The button that will be used for the slider selected.

BGG.title: Slider Small Decrease Button
BGG.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BGH.title: Slider Small Increase Button
BGH.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BGJ.title: Slider Track Button
BGJ.description: The button that will be used for the slider track.

BHE.title: Text Box Name
BHE.description: The name of the text box.

BHF.title: Text Control
BHF.description: The control that will be used for the text.

BHG.title: Text Edit Box Grid Collection Name
BHG.description: The name of the collection that the text edit box grid is in.

BIA.title: Texture File System
BIA.description: The file system that the texture is in.

BIC.title: Tiled
BIC.description: If true, the texture will be tiled.

BID.title: Toggle Default State
BID.description: The default state of the toggle.

BIE.title: Toggle Grid Collection Name
BIE.description: The name of the collection that the toggle grid is in.

BIF.title: Toggle Group Default Selected
BIF.description: The default selected toggle of the toggle group.

BIG.title: Toggle Group Forced Index
BIG.description: The forced index of the toggle group.

BII.title: Toggle Off Button
BII.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BIJ.title: Toggle On Button
BIJ.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BJA.title: Touch Mode
BJA.description: The touch mode of the element.

BJB.title: TTS Control Header
BJB.description: The header of the TTS control.

BJC.title: TTS Control Type Order Priority
BJC.description: The priority of the TTS control type order.

BJE.title: TTS Ignore Subsections
BJE.description: If true, the element will ignore subsections.

BJF.title: TTS Index Priority
BJF.description: The priority of the TTS index.

BJG.title: TTS Inherit Siblings
BJG.description: If true, the element will inherit its siblings.

BJI.title: TTS Override Control Value
BJI.description: If true, the TTS will override the control value.

BJJ.title: TTS Section Header
BJJ.description: The header of the TTS section.

CAA.title: TTS Toggle Off
CAA.description: If true, the TTS will toggle off.

CAB.title: TTS Toggle On
CAB.description: If true, the TTS will toggle on.

CAC.title: TTS Value Changed
CAC.description: If true, the TTS value will change.

CAD.title: TTS Value Order Priority
CAD.description: The priority of the TTS value order.

CAG.title: Unchecked Control
CAG.description: The control that will be unchecked.

CAH.title: Unchecked Hover Control
CAH.description: The control that will be unchecked when hovered.

CAI.title: Unchecked Locked Control
CAI.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked.

CAJ.title: Unchecked Locked Hover Control
CAJ.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked and hovered.

CBA.title: Use Anchored Offset
CBA.description: If true, the element will use the anchored offset.

CBB.title: Use Last Focus
CBB.description: If true, the element will use the last focus.

CBC.title: Variables
CBC.description: The variables that are contained within this element.

CBD.title: Virtual Keyboard Buffer Control
CBD.description: The control that will be used for the virtual keyboard buffer.

CBE.title: Visible
CBE.description: If true, the element will be visible.

CBF.title: Zip Folder
CBF.description: The folder that the element will be zipped into.

CBG.title: Control IDs
CBG.description: The IDs of the controls that will be created by the factory.
